TopicTitle: The Oscar-B Squasher, Support the ROUND-8!

Articles.Content:
We here at Patnydustries felt that sharing a newspaper article wasn't satisfying enough for us to support the ROUND-8, so we took things a step further.

We made a squashing thingy!

![gzp7MD0.png](http://i.imgur.com/gzp7MD0.png)

According to Patnydustries logic: Less Oscar-Bs Existing = More Demand for LFO ROUND-8s!

Starter pack includes:

-Short size crane

-Ballast for short size crane

-The Booster of Squashing

-10 Free Oscar-Bs(because apparently, black marketing the Oscar-Bs will also cause less sales by Probodobodyne)

-Instruction booklet(in the description)

-Satisfaction after Destruction

-1 Year Warranty(void if modified for squashing more than 10 Oscar-Bs)

So why not get your own Patnydustries Oscar-B Squasher at:

[http://www./download/dyur4cncb4vfocp/Oscar-B_Squasher.zip](http://www./download/dyur4cncb4vfocp/Oscar-B_Squasher.zip) ?

Also, throttling to 100% and turning on SAS seems to somehow make Oscar-Bs more easily squashable, i tested.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-17T17:01:35Z" title="04/17/2015 05:01  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 17, 2015</time> by KotDemopan**
lol so what did i miss are the devs taking the life savers out of the full release or something?

> 
> lol so what did i miss are the devs taking the life savers out of the full release or something?

They are turning it into a Xenon tank ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

We squashed enough Oscar-Bs to have the Round-8 stay!

....Despite the fact there were only 4 downloads!

lawl.........

but i HOPE the oscar-B is permanently staying!

If they remove it ill be unable to use pirate torpedoes anymore (ant engine+oscar+2docking ports). While they are completely useless, its funny to launch salvos of 20+ of them at once (lowish part count too).
